title: College providing MacBooks and iPads to students to create digital equity
content:
Bowdoin College is once again giving students access to some of the latest Apple technology. The Collegeâ€™s Digital Excellence Commitment (DExC) will provide each incoming student with a 13-inch M1 MacBook Pro, an iPad mini, and an Apple Pencil. Students are receiving these devices at either Orientation or when the Fall 2022 semester begins.

more…

The post College providing MacBooks and iPads to students to create digital equity appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Bowdoin College will provide each incoming student with a 13-inch M1 MacBook Pro, an iPad mini, and Apple Pencil in the Fall 2022 semester.
